Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip, which has flaked away in places, and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394017) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394017)
